select t_department.id as department_id, t_department.name as department_name, t_department.code as department_code, t_customer_type.code as customer_type_code,t_customer_type.name as customer_type_name, sum(t_order_refound_detail.refound_sum) as refound_sum ,sum(t_order_refound_detail.refound_weight) as refound_weight from t_order ,t_order_dispatcher,t_sysuser,t_department,t_customer,t_customer_type,t_order_refound_detail where t_order.id = t_order_dispatcher.order_idx AND t_order_dispatcher.dispatcher_dep_idx = t_department.id AND t_order_dispatcher.dispatcher_idx = t_sysuser.user_idx and t_order.customer_idx = t_customer.user_idx and t_customer.cst_type = t_customer_type.id and t_order.id = t_order_refound_detail.order_idx and t_order.order_trigger_type = 1
and (t_department.code = #{departmentCode})
and ( t_order.complete_time >= #{startTime} )
and ( #{endTime} >= t_order.complete_time )
and t_order.pay_type = #{payType.index}
and t_order.pay_status = #{payStatus.index}
group by t_department.id,t_customer_type.code
